snippet: A draft resolution is a response to the use of chlorine bombs in Syria’s civil war after the Syrian government agreed to destroy its chemical weapons.
abstract: United States urges United Nations Security Council to condemn use of chlorine as chemical weapon in Syria.
lead_paragraph: A draft resolution is a response to the use of chlorine bombs in Syria’s civil war after the Syrian government agreed to destroy its chemical weapons.

headline.main: U.S. Presses U.N. on Syria Chlorine Attacks
headline.print_headline: U.S. Presses U.N. on Syria Chlorine Attacks

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons
